SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.cuda

Class CUaccessPolicyWindow

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.cuda.CUaccessPolicyWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class CUaccessPolicyWindow extends Struct implements NativeResource
Specifies an access policy for a window, a contiguous extent of memory beginning at base_ptr and ending at base_ptr + num_bytes.

num_bytes is limited by DEVICE_ATTRIBUTE_MAX_ACCESS_POLICY_WINDOW_SIZE. Partition into many segments and assign segments such that: sum of "hit segments" / window == approx. ratio. sum of "miss segments" / window == approx 1-ratio. Segments and ratio specifications are fitted to the capabilities of the architecture. Accesses in a hit segment apply the hitProp access policy. Accesses in a miss segment apply the missProp access policy.

Layout


 struct CUaccessPolicyWindow {
     void * base_ptr();
     size_t num_bytes();
     float hitRatio();
     CUaccessProperty hitProp();
     CUaccessProperty missProp();
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • CUaccessPolicyWindow

      public CUaccessPolicyWindow(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a CUaccessPolicyWindow instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.

    • base_ptr

      public long base_ptr()
      starting address of the access policy window. CUDA driver may align it.

    • num_bytes

      public long num_bytes()
      size in bytes of the window policy. CUDA driver may restrict the maximum size and alignment.

    • hitRatio

      public float hitRatio()
      specifies percentage of lines assigned hitProp, rest are assigned missProp

    • hitProp

      public int hitProp()
      CUaccessProperty set for hit

    • missProp

      public int missProp()
      CUaccessProperty set for miss. Must be either ACCESS_PROPERTY_NORMAL or ACCESS_PROPERTY_STREAMING
